bibl.title: Women as Holders of Rights in Ancient Egypt (During the Late Period).
bibl.note: A summary of this paper was delivered in Cambridge in 1987 at the 3rd International Conference of Demotic Studies. - Focuses on demotic (and Greek) documents such as private agreements and official records. Considers neither marriage settlements, nor documents relating to inheritance.
bibl.seg: ALLAM Schafik, Women as Holders of Rights in Ancient Egypt (During the Late Period).

A summary of this paper was delivered in Cambridge in 1987 at the 3rd International Conference of Demotic Studies. - Focuses on demotic (and Greek) documents such as private agreements and official records. Considers neither marriage settlements, nor documents relating to inheritance.
